@usman555 wrote:

change the sendmessage to sendMessage or sM

Java is case-sensitive.

item.title: Trisidiax v2 317 commands.java [fixed.]
item.dc:creator: @killerjens9 killerjens9
item.description:
@killerjens9 wrote:

(1. error) i get error when i added ::claim command this is my claim code if (playerCommand.startsWith("reward") || playerCommand.startsWith("claim")) { if(c.checkVotes(c.playerName)) { c.getItems().addItem(3062, 2); c.Wheel +=2; c.lvlPoints +=10; c.sendmessage("You claimed your reward."); c.getDH().sendDialogues(60, 945); } else { c.sendMessage("You have not voted yet type ::vote4cash to do so."); } }
when i compile i get this: [code]src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:358: error: cannot find symbol
c.sendmessage(“You claimed your reward.”);
^
symbol: method sendmessage(String)
location: variable c of type Client
Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details.
1 error

–DevastationX Has Completely Finished its Compileing!–

Tryck på en valfri tangent för att fortsätta…[/code]

Read full topic
